about_the_game:
"Sura" is a unique combo based horizontal board chopping game. There are no high-powered overbearing monsters or rich level maps. What the player can do is constantly hone their own, on a road to home, defense to eliminate the tide of invading monsters. Instead of simply beating the enemy, you need to use your skills to get high combo ratings and squeeze as much resources and treasures out of the enemy as possible to ensure that you can meet the next challenge.

Peace of mind helps you overcome difficulties

The key to the level of the combo is the control of anger. In addition to making the player attack faster, improving the smoothness of the combo and increasing the possibility of connecting more moves, the success of the rage level will also make it easier for the player to get a high combo rating, but the failure of the combo level will also have a corresponding cost.

All kinds of skills in one

Not only can the player level up to unlock certain skills, but they can also acquire various types of martial arts from the battlefield to study and learn powerful lessons through martial arts.

The right combination triggers potential

Accessories and Horcruxes are bound by elements, and when paired correctly, they can bring out the Horcrux's special properties and help you excel.

Make arrangements to control the situation

Grasp the deployment at the end of each battle, ability upgrade, skill study, equipment adjustment, recuperation...... Each step is crucial to the tide of the war.

Work on skills and challenge

Players can learn different skills in the exercise table after the war, and there will be different rewards of skill tasks for players to challenge.
